extendedInfo.description: Love it when your friends FAIL?!Find it funny when a stranger is victim of an EPIC FAIL?!Of course you do, it's hilarious!Now you can really rub salt into the wounds with the Fail Button.A selection of professionally recorded, side splitting 'Fail!' phrases are guaranteed to make any fail even funnier!Let everyone know just how badly they failed, download the Fail Button today!
